flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The tip of itsntail, which con­ntains oil that isflighter than wa­nter, lets it swimnwithout drowning.
The end of itsntail serves as anbuoy that keepsfit from drowning,neven in a viciousncurrent.
The fur on itsnbody naturallynrepels water. Itfcan stay dry, evennwhen it plays innthe water.

MARILL’s oil-filled tail acts much likena life preserver. If you see just itsntail bobbing on the water’s surface,fit’s a sure indication that this POKéMONnis diving beneath the water to feed onnaquatic plants.
When fishing for food at the edge of anfast-running stream, MARILL wraps itsntail around the trunk of a tree.fThis POKéMON’s tail is flexible andnconfigured to stretch.
Its body is covered with water-repellentnfur. Because of the fur, it can swimnthrough water at high speed without beingnslowed by the water’s resistance.
The end of its tail serves as a buoy thatnkeeps it from drowning, even in a viciousncurrent.
The tip of its tail, which contains oilnthat is lighter than water, lets it swimnwithout drowning.
Using its tail as a float, it divesnunderwater. It likes eating plantsnthat grow on river bottoms.
The tip of its tail is filled with oilnthat is lighter than water, so itnacts as a float.
The oil-filled end of its tail floatsnon water. It keeps MARILL fromndrowning even in a strong current.
The tip of its tail, which containsnoil that is lighter than water,nlets it swim without drowning.
The end of its tail serves as anbuoy that keeps it from drowning,neven in a vicious current.
Sa queue à l’extrémité rempliend’huile fait office de flotteur etnlui permet de ne pas couler.
The oil-filled end of its tail floatsnon water. It keeps Marill fromndrowning even in a strong current.
Sa queue à l’extrémité rempliend’huile fait office de flotteur etnlui permet de ne pas couler.
The oil-filled end of its tail floatsnon water. It keeps Marill fromndrowning even in a strong current.
The oil-filled tail functionsnas a buoy, so it’s fine evennin rivers with strong currents.
The oil-filled tail functionsnas a buoy, so it’s fine evennin rivers with strong currents.
ぜんしんの　たいもうはnみずを　はじく　せいしつを　もちnみずあび　しても　かわいている。
전신의 털은n물을 튕겨내는 성질을 지녀n물을 끼얹어도 말라 있다.
Sa fourrure est imperméable, si bien qu’il reste secnmême en jouant dans l’eau.
Sein Fell ist von Natur aus wasserabweisend.nEs bleibt trocken, auch wenn es im Wasser spielt.
Tiene una piel que repele el agua. De hecho, puedenpasarse horas jugando en el agua sin mojarse.
La pelliccia è idrorepellente. Così, rimane asciuttonanche giocando nell’acqua.
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It cannstay dry, even when it plays in the water.
全身の　体毛はn水を　弾く　性質を　持ちn水浴び　しても　乾いている。
しっぽの　さきには　みずより　かるいnあぶらが　つまっているのでnうきぶくろの　かわりに　なるのだ。
꼬리의 끝에는 물보다 가벼운n기름이 가득 차 있어서n부낭 대신 쓸 수 있다.
Le bout de sa queue renferme une huile plus légèrenque l’eau qui fait office de flotteur.
Seine Schweifspitze ist mit Öl gefüllt, das leichternals Wasser ist, sodass es nicht untergeht.
La punta de su cola está llena de un aceite que, alnser más ligero que el agua, le permite flotar.
La punta della coda contiene un olio più leggerondell’acqua, che gli permette di stare a galla.
The tip of its tail is filled with oil that is lighter thannwater, so it acts as a float.
尻尾の　先には　水より　軽いn油が　つまっているのでn浮き袋の　かわりに　なるのだ。
あぶらの　つまった　しっぽは　うきわの　かわり。nすいめんに　しっぽだけが　ういている　ときはnもぐって　みずくさを　たべている　めじるしだ。
기름이 가득한 꼬리는 튜브 대용이다.n수면에 꼬리만 떠 있을 때는n잠수하여 물풀을 먹고 있다는 표시다.

La queue remplie d’huile de Marill lui sert de gilet densauvetage. Parfois, on peut voir sa queue flotter à la surface.nOn peut en déduire que ce Pokémon a plongé sous l’eaunpour se nourrir de plantes aquatiques.

Marills Schweif ist mit Öl gefüllt und dient ihm als eine ArtnRettungsring. Wenn nur sein Schweif an der Wasseroberflächenzu sehen ist, taucht dieses Pokémon gerade, um sich vonnWasserpflanzen zu ernähren.
La cola de Marill contiene un aceite que hace las veces denchaleco salvavidas. Si ves una moviéndose en el agua, seguronque debajo hay un Marill medio sumergido buscando plantasnacuáticas para comer.

La coda di Marill contiene dell’olio e agisce da salvagente.nSe si scorge soltanto la sua coda a pelo d’acqua, significanche questo Pokémon si sta immergendo in profonditànper cibarsi di piante acquatiche.

Marill’s oil-filled tail acts much like a life preserver. If you seenjust its tail bobbing on the water’s surface, it’s a surenindication that this Pokémon is diving beneath the water tonfeed on aquatic plants.
油の　つまった　尻尾は　浮き輪の　代り。n水面に　尻尾だけが　浮いている　ときはn潜って　水草を　食べている　目印だ。
ながれの　はやい　かわで　エサを　とる　ときはnしっぽを　かわべりの　きの　みきに　まきつける。nしっぽは　だんりょくがあって　のびる　しくみ。
흐름이 빠른 강에서 먹이를 잡을 때는n꼬리를 강가의 나무줄기에 휘감는다.n꼬리는 탄력이 있어서 늘어나는 구조다.

Lorsqu’il pêche pour se nourrir sur les rives d’un fleuve rapide,nMarill accroche sa queue autour d’un tronc d’arbre pournne pas être emporté. La queue de ce Pokémon est flexiblenet résiste à l’étirement.
Wenn es am Ufer eines reißenden Flusses fischt,nwickelt Marill seinen Schweif um einen Baumstamm.nDer Schweif dieses Pokémon ist flexibel und elastisch,nsodass es ihn ausdehnen kann.
Este Pokémon tiene la cola muy flexible y elástica. A la horande pescar a su presa en una rápida corriente, Marill enroscanla cola en un árbol.
Per nutrirsi Marill pesca il cibo in riva a torrenti impetuosi,navvinghiando la coda attorno ai tronchi degli alberi. La codandi questo Pokémon è flessibile e dalla costituzione elastica.
When fishing for food at the edge of a fast-running stream,nMarill wraps its tail around the trunk of a tree. This Pokémon’sntail is flexible and configured to stretch.
流れの　速い　川で　エサを　取る　ときはn尻尾を　川べりの　木の　幹に　巻きつける。n尻尾は　弾力があって　伸びる　仕組み。
まるい　しっぽは　うきわの　かわり。nたまの　なかには　あぶらに　かえたnえいようが　たっぷり　つまっている。
둥근 꼬리는 튜브 대용이다.n그 안에는 영양으로 가득 찬n기름이 들어 있다.
圓圓的尾巴能用來代替n救生圈。球裡面滿滿都是n轉換成油脂的營養。
Sa queue ronde lui sert de bouée.nLa boule au bout de celle-ci est rempliende nutriments qui se sont changés en huile.
Marills runde Schweifspitze dient ihm als eine ArtnSchwimmring. Sie ist mit Nährstoffen gefüllt,ndie in Fett umgewandelt wurden.
La punta redonda de su cola hace las veces denflotador. En ella almacena abundantes nutrientesnen forma de aceite.
La coda rotonda funge da salvagente. All’internondella palla sono conservate sostanze nutritivensotto forma di grasso.
This Pokémon uses its round tail as a float. Thenball of Marill’s tail is filled with nutrients thatnhave been turned into an oil.
丸い　しっぽは　浮き輪の　かわり。n球の　中には　脂に　変えたn栄養が　たっぷり　詰まっている。
圆圆的尾巴拥有n救生圈的功能。球里满是n转变为了油脂的营养。
よく　みずを　はじく　たいもうはnつめたい　うみから　あがったときでもnすぐに　かわいて　さむくないのだ。
물을 잘 튕겨내는 털은n차가운 바다에 있다가 나와도n금방 말라서 춥지 않다.
很能彈開水的體毛就算是n從寒冷的海裡上岸時也能n立刻乾掉，一點都不冷。
Sa fourrure est hydrophobe, si bien qu’ellensèche en un instant. Il n’a donc jamais froid,nmême lorsqu’il sort d’une mer glaciale.
Sein wasserabweisendes Fell trocknet sofort undnhält Marill warm, selbst wenn es aus kaltemnMeerwasser auftaucht.
Su pelaje repele el agua, lo que evita que pasenfrío al salir de mares gélidos porque se seca alnmomento.
Non soffre il freddo nemmeno quando emergendai mari gelidi, grazie alla pelliccia idrorepellentenche si asciuga subito.
Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water-nrepellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leavesnthe water. That’s why this Pokémon is never cold.
よく　水を　弾く　体毛はn冷たい　海から　上がったときでもnすぐに　乾いて　寒くないのだ。
体毛的防水性能很好，n就算是从冰冷的海里上岸，n身体也会立刻干掉，一点都不冷。
